title: SCP漢字ドリル ハブ
content:
[[include :scp-jp:credit:start]]
**タイトル:** SCP漢字ドリルハブ
**著者:** SCP漢字ドリル製作委員会
**作成年:** 2024
[[include :scp-jp:credit:end]]

[[include :scp-jp:component:toggle-sidebar]]
[[size 200%]]
##b94047|はじめに##
[[/size]]
[[size 100%]]
今回のアンソロジーでは「そだつ」をテーマに、1年生で習う漢字をタイトルに用いた記事を寄稿していただきました。参加者の皆さんに漢字を一文字ずつ割り振り、そこから着想される記事を投稿しました。

漢字ドリルのような、漢字一文字ごとの読み、意味、成り立ち、構成、熟語について集中して考える機会は学校を卒業した今では滅多にありません。久々に漢字、及びそこから着想されるアイデアに思いを馳せながら楽しんでいただければ幸いです。
[[/size]]

[[size 200%]]
##223a70|一学期##
[[/size]]

[[module CSS]]
@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=BIZ+UDPMincho:wght@400;700&family=Klee+One&display=swap");

body {
    font-family: "BIZ UDPMincho", serif;
}

.main-wrapper {
    align-items: center;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-direction: row-reverse;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: .8rem 0
}
.kanji-wrapper {
    color: #000;
    display: flex;
    font-size: .8rem;
    flex-direction: row;
    writing-mode: vertical-rl;
}
.page-number {
    font-family: "verdana", "arial", "helvetica", sans-serif;
    font-size: .75rem;
    text-align: right;
    writing-mode: horizontal-tb;
}
.page-number a {
    background-color: #c91d7e;
    color: #fff;
    display: inline-block;
    margin: .1rem .35rem .1rem .1rem;
    padding: 0 .1rem;
}
.kanji-inner {
    border: 1.5px solid #000;
    border-radius: 0 1rem 0 0;
    display: grid;
    grid-auto-columns: 5rem 1fr auto;
    grid-auto-rows: 4rem 4rem;
    grid-template-areas:
     "kanji quote author"
     "kanji practice practice";
    height: 20rem;
    text-align: start;
    width: 8rem;
}
.kanji {
    align-items: center;
    background-color: #ff0;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #808080;
    border-radius: 0 1rem 0 0;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    grid-area: kanji;
    justify-content: space-evenly;
    padding: 0 .15rem;
    text-align: center;
    width: -webkit-fill-available;
}
.kanji div {
    letter-spacing: .15rem;
}
.kanji .link {
    line-height:1; /* firefox対策 */
}
.kanji .link a {
    color: #000;
    font-size: 4.25rem;
    position: relative;
}
.kanji .link a:hover {
    text-decoration: none;
}
.kanji .link a:hover::after {
    background-color: #000;
    bottom: 0;
    content: "";
    display: block;
    height: 1px;
    left: 0;
    margin: auto;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    width: 100%;
}
.quote {
    align-self: center;
    font-size: .8rem;
    grid-area: quote;
    line-height: 1.5;
    padding: .15rem 0;
}
.author {
    align-self: center;
    font-size: .6rem;
    grid-area: author;
    padding: 0 0 .15rem;
}
.practice {
    align-items: center;
    display: flex;
    font-family: "Klee One", serif;
    grid-area: practice;
    justify-content: center;
}
.practice span {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #808080;
    border-right: 1px solid #808080;
    display: block;
    font-size: 2.625rem;
    height: 3.75rem;
    line-height: 3.75rem;
    opacity: .25;
    position: relative;
    text-align: center;
    width: 3.75rem;
}
.practice span::before,
.practice span::after {
    background-position: center;
    background-size: 3px 3px;
    bottom: 0;
    content: "";
    display: block;
    left: 0;
    margin: auto;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    z-index: -1;
}
.practice span::before {
    background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 1px, #0ff 2px);
    height: 1px;
    width: 100%;
}
.practice span::after {
    background-image: linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 1px, #0ff 2px);
    height: 100%;
    width: 1px;
}
.practice span:last-of-type {
    border-bottom: none;
}
[[/module]]
